content: Matt Bailey's New Firm - SiteLogic Public Relations By: Rand Fishkin March 23, 2006 The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. Table of Contents Copied! By: Rand Fishkin March 23, 2006 Matt Bailey's New Firm - SiteLogic Public Relations The author's views are entirely their own (excluding the unlikely event of hypnosis) and may not always reflect the views of Moz. I'm pleased to be able to break the news that Matt Bailey, formerly of the Karcher Group, has opened his own SEO & web marketing consultation firm - SiteLogic. Why is he going directly to the Recommend List? Because Matt is one of the smartest, fastest moving people in the industry. Matt's the type of guy who knows everything that's taken place in the world of search and how to apply that information to achieve success. Along with a nice looking site, Matt has joined the ranks of the blogosphere with his own forray. Hopefully we'll see lots of cool content popping up in the near future. Congrats, Matt and best of luck to you - building a business is hard, but the support of friends and fans will, hopefully, make it easier. Copied! Back to Top
